Module: Sprout::VERSION

Defined in:
lib/sprout/version.rb

Constant Summary

STRING = 
File.read(File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), '..', '..', 'VERSION').strip)
MAJOR = 
STRING.split('.')[0]
MINOR = 
STRING.split('.')[1]
TINY = 
STRING.split('.')[2]
RELEASE = 
STRING.split('.')[3]
MAJOR_MINOR = 
[MAJOR, MINOR].join('.')
